mapper.select: select * from sell_detail order by no desc

select item_name item_name, sum((out_price-in_price) * amount) profit,sum(amount) amount, avg(in_price) in_price, avg(out_price) out_price from (select sd.no, i.name as item_name, sd.amount, i.in_price as in_price, i.out_price as out_price from sell_detail sd, item i where sd.item_no=i.no)
where item_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
group by item_name

select count(*) from(select item_name item_name, sum((out_price-in_price) * amount) profit,sum(amount) amount, avg(in_price) in_price, avg(out_price) out_price from (select sd.no, i.name as item_name, sd.amount, i.in_price as in_price, i.out_price as out_price from sell_detail sd, item i where sd.item_no=i.no)group by item_name)
where item_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select sn.no, sn.sell_no, sn.amount, sn.sell_price, sn.lot_code, sn.item_no, it.code code, it.name name from(select * from sell_detail where order_sheet_no = #{orderSheetNo}) sn inner join item it on sn.item_no = it.no
